content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest news and updates about recent controversies related to athletic programs at the University of North Carolina campuses. However, controversies in college sports are not uncommon, and various universities have faced issues ranging from recruiting violations and academic scandals to sexual assault allegations and athlete compensation disputes. The NCAA has also faced scrutiny and criticisms for its handling of various issues related to college sports. Nonetheless, college sports continue to be an integral part of university life, with many student-athletes participating and representing their schools in various sporting competitions.
